title: "NexOptic Announces Collaboration with Semicon Networks & South Korean Government for Auto-Pilot Systems"
excerpt: "NexOptic Technology Corp. (“NexOptic” or the “Company”) (TSX VENTURE: NXO) (OTCQB: NXOPF) (FSE: E3O1), an innovator in cutting-edge patented and patent-pending Artificial Intelligence (AI) announced today that its ALIIS™ AI has been selected by Semicon Networks of South Korea to bring safer vision solutions to automotive auto-pilot systems."
